text: Osbaldo Lupo Lastra García (born 12 June 1983) is an Ecuadorian footballer who plays as a midfielder. Lastra was called up for the 2015 Copa América making the cut for the final 23 this time around. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:People from San Lorenzo, Ecuador Category:Association football midfielders Category:Ecuadorian footballers Category:C.S.D. title: Osbaldo Lastra
